definition: an ocean trip taken for pleasure, travel on water propelled by wind or by other means
details:
noun
- an ocean trip taken for pleasure
= synonyms: cruise
- a large piece of fabric (usually canvas fabric) by means of which wind is used to propel a sailing vessel
= synonyms: canvas, canvass, sheet
- any structure that resembles a sail
verb
- travel on water propelled by wind or by other means
= example: travel on water propelled by wind or by other means
= synonyms: voyage
- traverse or travel on (a body of water)
= example: traverse or travel on (a body of water)
- move with sweeping, effortless, gliding motions
= synonyms: sweep
- travel on water propelled by wind
= example: travel on water propelled by wind
